Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This product is not just an item, but a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Given its value and quality, we believe it's worth more than $120 to you. Considering its exceptional features and benefits, I am offering it to you for $150. This price reflects the superior quality and the unique value it brings to its users. I trust this offer will be attractive to you, and I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
